title: Permabanned for defending my team after a Inting flamer started going berserk what a great system<3
body:
Someone was intenting my silver 2 promos  after losing my last promos to 2 afks but this one was flaming and intenting blaming others on his falied tower dives as the legend himself first time kayn....   What a great game hey riot fix your mmr system since a serious player shouldnt be put with a troll it makes no sense to me that his mmr is counted the same as a lost whether going 0-15 or going 10-15 with the least damage and no assits with zero objectives please riot 
FIX YOUR SYSTEM IF YOU WANT FAIR COMPETITIVE PLAY

replies.body: This wasn't your first ban and you were not "defending" anyone but straight up flaming. And I don't even need your chat logs to know that. Quit the pathetic attempt to sound innocent no one here believes you anyway. Your account is gone forever and your raging and lying wont change a damn thing about this. Cheers.
This is about the only time I will upvote an aggressive post on these boards. Well said.
watch him refuse to post the chat log
Considering it takes alot to get permabanned unless you were using hate speech or cheating, you aren't telling the full story.
Riot banned you because they don't like you telling off a Tumblr LoL player.
